content:
Should we meet in June? Last June we only had three people (and we took July and August off).

I'm up for it but I definitely can't do June 2nd or 23rd.

What do you think?
Maybe take a head count of interest? Were you one of the more reluctant parties yourself last summer?
Also note that we did just add some people. We may not want to lose them. Though that one guy was only in town for college and he'll likely be gone in June.
I wasn't particularly reluctant but I can understand if people don't want to hang out in a bar at 5pm when it's gorgeous out.
Yeah, that guy said he'd come again in the fall when he's back in town for school.
Well I don't particularly mind coming down to Boston, especially if I can do something in the day if it's nice out.
Cool, cool, so when you say "take a head count" do you think we should just @ people in this thread?
Here's the "how often to meet during the summer" discussion from last year: https://github.com/orgs/bostonopen/discussions/5
Yeah one way or another see if anyone else would want to show up over the summer.
Anyone else reading this thread: how about you?
https://mastodon.zaclys.com/@kir0ul Made a hidden post saying they'd be interested in our next meeting. Only visible by our account.

Well, let's see if we can get a :thumbs_up: by @mentioning some folks.

@August Radjoe @Jose Lucas Cordeiro @Yamil Suarez @Pete Meyer @Stone Chen @Sai Dutt @Ista Zahn @Jason Key do you want to meet in June? If so, please give a :thumbs_up:

(If we get enough, we can figure out a date next.) :grinning:
I keep missing, but this one I really want to come to
Could go either way for me - not sure of the dates yet, but there's a chance I'll be out of town sometime in June.
Yeah early June will be less likely to work for me.

How do people feel about meeting later in the evening? 7pm instead of 5pm, for example. Just for the summer months, I mean, when people would probably rather be out enjoying the sunshine than be in a bar.
Oh that's an idea.
I'd be okay with that.
How about Sunday, June 9th at 7pm?
I have to see about my early June plans.
I'd rather keep that open until it's made solid.
How about Sunday, June 16th at 7pm? It's Father's Day. I could always show up late. Daddy needs his medicine.
I can do June 9th at 7pm, but on June 16th I'll be visiting family out of state. Though feel free to meet on the 16th.
How about we put it to a vote?
Sunday, June 2nd, 7pm
Sunday, June 9th, 7pm
Sunday, June 16th, 7pm
Sunday, June 23rd, 7pm
Sunday, June 30th, 7pm
Approval voting I assume?
I had to look that up but, yes, please vote for as many dates as you want.
I voted partially for the 9th since it's a maybe and should perhaps serve as a tie breaker if the current vote stands.
It looks like we have a winner: 5 votes for Sunday, June 30th, 7pm. I'll update the website soon. Stop me if you really, really want a different date!
The system works!

Ha, ok, I updated the website: https://bostonopen.dev

Thanks, all. See you there!
https://floss.social/@bostonopen/112627293205256820
Turns out I'll have to miss this one :( Hadn't been sure enough about the timing for the poll
No worries, Pete, and nice post, @Dan!

Dan said:

https://mastodon.zaclys.com/@kir0ul Made a hidden post saying they'd be interested in our next meeting. Only visible by our account.

Hey, that was me :wave: I've been looking for like-minded people since I moved to Boston a few months ago, can't wait to meet you all! Unfortunately, today doesn't work great for me, but since it's been a while I wanted to join (since LibrePlanet), I'll try to come around one hour just to say hi. I'll probably be in the area early, like 5:30 pm or so.
I'm also curious to talk to @Dan (or whoever is working on it) about Sandstrom :wink:
Oh, to be clear we're meeting at 7PM today
Ah you said early. Well, I won't be there til 7. Got a full schedule today.
Sounds good, I'll probably be in some coffee shop or something until 7pm :coffee:
Ah Cool. There's Temptations just a block or two away. I've hung out there before a meetup. Happy to talk Sandstorm anytime :smiley:. Also OpenStreetMap.
Iâ€™m not able to go today. Sorry guys !

Dan said:

Ah Cool. There's Temptations just a block or two away. I've hung out there before a meetup. Happy to talk Sandstorm anytime :smiley:. Also OpenStreetMap.

Cool, I just recently started to map stuff on OSM :sweat_smile:
@Andrea welcome! Glad you can make it
We should have another new person who emailed me
We're here! Not our usual spot, we're in the back of the main room.

A pic from Milan (thanks!) from Sunday:

PXL_20240701_010456696.MP.jpg
https://floss.social/@bostonopen/112717247483527395
